ABOUT.heading: About the Event
ABOUT.strong: WELCOME IEM ALUMNI 2025 is organized in the warm spirit of Vietnamese Teachers' Day (20/11). The event welcomes new alumni, honors the connection between generations, and embodies the “Pay-It-Forward” spirit through fundraising and awarding scholarships to current IEM students.
ABOUT.p1: It is also an occasion for alumni to return to their alma mater, pay tribute to teachers, witness the development of the Faculty, and inspire young lecturers through stories of success and innovation in education.
ABOUT.p2: The event also strengthens connections within the ISE, Logistics, and Supply Chain community, and calls for the establishment of the IEM Alumni Association Representative Board - consisting of nine dynamic and trusted members from different cohorts.
